text: Who said being first makes you a winner, these new reality stars are proving that coming second ( or third or even fifth ) comes with some impressive runner's up prizes. Mansions, couture, secret champagne fridges and a whole lot of drama is on its way to E! with the first trailer for new reality show second Wives Clubs released Friday. The show has been a long time coming, with filming first starting back in 2015 and since then it has had a name change before returning to its original title and even had a star try to sue E! to stop parts of it airing.
